text: An American Citizen is a 1914 American silent romantic comedy movie directed by J. Searle Dawley and was based on the 1897 Broadway play of the same name. It stars John Barrymore (in his movie debut), Peter Lang, Alexander Gaden, Wellington A. Playter, Hal Clarendon and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It is a lost movie. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1914 comedy movies Category:1910s romance movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by J. Searle Dawley Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies based on plays
title: An American Citizen
